# remove(_:)

**Instance Method**

Removes a media item from the music player’s queue.

## Declaration

```swift
func remove(_ item: MPMediaItem)
```

## Parameters

- **item**: The media item to remove from the queue.

## Adding and removing items

- **insert(_:after:)**: Inserts a modified queue after the designated media item.

items.description: Inserts a modified queue after the designated media item.
items.name: insert(_:after:)
